text:
What's the correct call to the Webhooks API via Postman to retrieve webhook settings currently configured for an app?

My GET request at the moment is: *{{baseUrl}}/webhooks/v3/{appId}/settings*

Is there a particular authorization credential I need to use?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/transactional-email-HubSpot-and-apis>
of course
glad I could help
You'll want to use your developer account hapikey
Do you know if it is possible to block non-UTF-8 characters in HubSpot forms?

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1678935763638109?thread_ts=1678928561.299909&cid=C22PU4LV8> FYI not calling you out for using AI, I also use AI for generating a lot of code. I'm just interested in the use of AI in HubSpot related work.
Great question! It's about 60% human, 40% AI
GPT4 usually gives surprisingly robust code, it's main flaw is that it's horrendously out of date, which causes issues with HubSpot especially as the API has been depreciated
wait, do dev account hapikeys still work?
the depreciation was only for private apps?
yes
that would have saved me so much time SMH
Yeah very true, although that particular api doesn't exist. I think GPT just hallucinated it

probably - it's great at
• pointing out errors in existing non functional (human written) code
• creating robust code that (sometimes!) works (that you can then debug and play find the problem)
yeah for sure, great for helping write code and augmenting your capabilities
you just still need to be in the driver's seat and call BS when applicable
yeah, agreed. 90+% of my experience in coding is python, I'm pretty new to JS and Appscript. How effective is python in workflow custom code do you know?
know they added it recent-ish, just not sure how broken it is
(and new to HubSpot - hi!)
It's pretty good, I still use node though because that's what I like, just to clarify though in the above code it wasn't a language issue it was an endpoint issue.
yeah I know aha
Welcome to the party
party
that's me not knowing HubSpot
not a problem with the language
but being new to the language I was assuming I F-ed something else up
You're totally good man, we're all still learning
always buddy
thx again
yes of course
I'll test this when my API limit resets ahaha
hit me up with any other issues
thx homie

Hello dev team, I am having issues with the new BETA popup-CTAs in that the popup takes 3 seconds to load? Any reason that might be? Here is the landing page: <https://www.fortegra.com/test-landing-page> . When I click on the button the chrome dev tools give me this error message.
After the popup loads the first time, it works as it should...but until the popup loads the first time after the user clicks the button there is a 3 second delay.

<@U04T2CUCP8T> Sorry don't really understand what you mean here: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1678986720667199?thread_ts=1678957595.741019&cid=C22PU4LV8>

Developer api keys are for developer accounts only, normal account used to support HapiKeys but those are now deprecated and have been replaced by Private Apps

Hey folks - I'm looking for examples of people building a custom quote based on either Product(s) that can be dragged into the quote (or selected) and/or blocks of text that can be easily added or removed from a custom quote. Anyone see or do anything like that yet?
